sentences.sContent: Sunlight can refrain the growth of melatonin in the body.
sentences.sContent_eng: Sunlight can refrain the growth of melatonin in the body.
sentences.sCn: 阳光能抑制身体中褪黑激素的生长。

sentences.sContent: So make your room dark and sleep early in the night allowing your body to produce melatonin.
sentences.sContent_eng: So make your room dark and sleep early in the night allowing your body to produce melatonin.
sentences.sCn: 所以晚上睡觉要保证房间黑暗并且早睡，这样能促进褪黑激素的产生。

sentences.sContent: To explain how light exposure at night might affect the moods of both hamsters and people, the researchers turn to a hormone called melatonin.
sentences.sContent_eng: To explain how light exposure at night might affect the moods of both hamsters and people, the researchers turn to a hormone called melatonin.
sentences.sCn: 为了解释夜间曝光是如何影响仓鼠和人类心情的，研究人员转向了一种叫褪黑激素的荷尔蒙。

trans.tranOther: a  hormone  that is sometimes used as a drug to help you sleep
